UPDATE qa
qa_option = #{qaOption},
qa_title = #{qaTitle},
qa_content = #{qaContent},
qa_img1 = #{qaImg1},
qa_img2 = #{qaImg2},
qa_img3 = #{qaImg3},
qa_modifydate = sysdate
WHERE qa_idx=#{qaIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT qa_idx , userinfo_id , qa_option , qa_title , qa_content , qa_img1 , qa_img2 , qa_img3 , TO_CHAR(qa_regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as qa_regdate , qa_modifydate FROM qa WHERE qa_idx=#{qaIdx}

SELECT qa_idx , userinfo_id , qa_option , qa_title , qa_content , qa_img1 , qa_img2 , qa_img3 , TO_CHAR(qa_regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as qa_regdate , qa_reply_status FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, qa_idx , userinfo_id , qa_option , qa_title , qa_content , qa_img1 , qa_img2 , qa_img3 , qa_regdate , qa_reply_status FROM ( SELECT qa_idx , userinfo_id , qa_option , qa_title , qa_content , qa_img1 , qa_img2 , qa_img3 , qa_regdate , qa_reply_status FROM qa
WHERE qa_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE qa_content LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
WHERE userinfo_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY qa_idx DESC ) qa ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS qa_count FROM qa WHERE userinfo_id = #{userinfoId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, BOARD.* FROM ( SELECT qa_idx , userinfo_id , qa_option , qa_title , qa_content , qa_img1 , qa_img2 , qa_img3 , TO_CHAR(qa_regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as qa_regdate , qa_reply_status FROM qa WHERE userinfo_id = #{userinfoId} ORDER BY qa_idx DESC ) BOARD ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
